expr: CREATE( (LOCAL )?(?P<temporal>TEMPORARY|TEMP))? TABLE( IF NOT EXISTS)? (?P<schema_name>[{ }\w_]+).(?P<table_name>[{ }\w_]+) ?\((?P<columns>([\w _](\(\d+\))?,?)+)\)( DISTSTYLE (?P<dist_style>(EVEN|KEY|ALL)))?( DISTKEY \((?P<dist_key>[\w_]+)\))?( (?P<sort_key_type>(COMPOUND|INTERLEAVED) )?SORTKEY \((?P<sort_keys>([\w _,]+))\))?
yes: CREATE TABLE my_schema.my_table (column1 INT, column2 VARCHAR(255))
CREATE TEMP TABLE example_schema.example_table (col1 INT, col2 VARCHAR(100)) DISTSTYLE EVEN
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE sample_schema.sample_table (id INT, name VARCHAR(50), age INT) DISTKEY (id)
CREATE LOCAL TEMP TABLE test_schema.test_table (c1 INT, c2 INT) INTERLEAVED SORTKEY (c1, c2)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS another_schema.another_table (data TEXT, timestamp TIMESTAMP) DISTSTYLE ALL
